name: Vampire's Paper Route
description:
In which a young boy wakes up, finds out he's a vampire and still soldiers on to get his route finished. Avoid angry vampire hunters, knock on doors, bite-- I mean talk to the townsfolk and make sure they get their news in this odd combination of a roguelite, rpg and bullethell-lite? 

The genres are more like... guidelines, anyway.

Built with: Unity 2017.3, using 2D assets from KenneyAssets, audio from GameArt.org, and fonts from Dafont!

Built for LudumDare 41 in April of 2018!
